page.title: 20Domesday Project - Credits
page.content: The information and data concerning Newburgh and its surrounding area was prepared by the Primary 7 pupils of the local Primary School during May and June, 1985. The assistance of the local Community Centre in giving slides of the Community Festival is appreciated. Pupils who took part were :- { { Fraser Hart Gail Williamson Kenneth Robinson Louise Sorley David Herd Tracey McFarlane Martin McEwen Jennifer Lipphardt Mark Bruce Lorna Berry Stewart Walker Lorna Green Neil Haggart Ann Allan Craig Inches Heather Hutt Michael Ross Amanda Webster Steven Coyle Kimberly Ross Ian Allan. Andrea Herd.
